successes.title: Robox : Desktop 3D Printer and Micro-Manufacturing Platform
successes.description: This is Robox! Designed to be the simplest, most reliable and comprehensive 3D printing platform available. Packed with innovation.

Pledges.description:
Thanks so much for your support!
You'll get a special mention on our backers website and be able to take advantage of our backers package on the Robox® forum.

Über supporter.
All the perks of above package and a Robox® Kickstarter team T-shirt.

PRE-ORDER price.
Order now and we will ship your Robox® as soon as it first rolls off the production line. You will have the first Kickstarter production build. Dressed in the limited edition Kickstarter colours and supplied with 2 taster reels of filament. You'll also get a custom appearance in our community.

Beta Supporter package.
Beta Supporter package. Be the first to own a Robox®! Help us make it the most reliable, easy-to-use and best 3D printer in the world.
Your Robox® will be hand built and tested and you will receive upgraded parts as they become available right up to the first production model! Dressed in the limited edition Kickstarter colours, we'll also send 3 reels of filament in a variety of colours and materials. 
Beta supporters will get the first releases of software and firmware updates prior to production, you'll also get a custom appearance in our community and access to the top secret beta testers section. Your invaluable feedback will be used to update all aspects of the Robox® platform.

Super Early Bird.
Be the first to get the full production Robox® and 2 reels of filament. Your Robox® will be a signed and numbered limited edition and you will have "Super Early Bird" status in the Robox® community.

Robox® 3D Printing Starter Pack.
Visit our HQ in Bristol, UK and get your hands on an early Limited Edition Robox® in the Kickstarter colours and have a days training to ensure you get the best results.
